long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Pinoc.io uses Machine Learning and crowd sourcing to suggest news content categorizations like "Fake news", "Reliable",  "Biased", ...

As you are reading news articles, one click on our Chrome extension will give you the prediction of our AI. you will also be able to vote for your view on the orientation of the news article.
